website_summaries.verdict: Reebok and Supermodel Gigi Hadid share something in common: that is to create something that looked ahead into the future. So Hadid put her twists on the Aztrek, an iconic 1990s runner, and took it to another level.This new Aztrek is fashionably accented with bold, hot pops of neon and crisp leather overlays, but still retains the original’s signature features—vintage bulky design, heavily paneled upper, Hexalite-cushioned sole with a rugged, diamond-studded tread. Priced affordably at $110 apiece, this charming Aztrek is a welcome addition to one’s fashionable wardrobe.
pros: The Reebok Aztrek x Gigi Hadid flaunts a chunky and trendy high-fashionesque design, which attracted many shoppers
It delivers superb value for its affordable price, according to several buyers
Based on reviews, it’s pretty comfortable to wear and adequately cushioned too
Several wearers of this model earned a handful of compliments from friends and onlookers
A couple of customers loved how well it matched and upped their different outfits
This Reebok Aztrek x Gigi Hadid is perfect for spring, some users noted
A small handful liked how the neon color palette gave this retro sneaker an extra pop
cons: Quite a couple complained that it fits wide
It runs a bit large, some wearers reported
A male reviewer considered its design as too feminine
This iteration has only two colorways

customer_reviews.title: Looking good, but size...
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy size 9.5 (women's size) for running shoes, rarely 9 or 10, depending on model and make. So I got first pair of Aztreks in size 8 (men's size) - they came HUGE. In bad condition and way too big. Returned. I got another pair size 7.5 - still a bit too big. Worn them once and figured that they are still a bit too big. Obviously can't return them now. I kept them but wearing not too often. ..And Boooy oh Boy they get filthy so fast..
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Retro Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. I love them and my wife hates them so that's even better!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C.

customer_reviews.title: Would like the correct size
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. They r huge. Would like to reorder but inside says size 7. Is that a mans 7.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Does run big but order one size down
customer_reviews.text: Brought for work I liking this sneakers got complimains on them already.. If u have a wider foot like me or u regular size 9.5 is not my reg size but they are comfy
customer_reviews.author: Aileen whipple

customer_reviews.title: Price Varies to Size - if you can get for a "Good Low Price" Do it - Solid Retro Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My college aged son is an athlete and he burns through shoes. Found these here on Amazon in his stupid big size dirt cheap and thought that even if he blows through them they are not costing me much. He loves them and they have lasted longer then most of his shoes. Two reasons, One; he isn't as hard on them because, two: he thinks they look cool and doesn't want to ruin them - with that said, he is still hard on them and they still look good and have blow out. Well worth the money - would buy several more, but they are out of his size...will keep checking back!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K. Preece

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! Order half size up!
customer_reviews.text: These classic shoes are super dope for a low price! I was honestly surprised. I wear a 9 in women’s so i ordered a 7.5 in mens. They are perfect length wise but width is a little narrow. So maybe order a half size up just in case. I feel like a size 8 would have been too floppy on my heel. I simply loosened up the laces and broke them in to make them more comfortable. That’s all it takes. No complaints other than that. And bonus the shoe makes me a little taller. Great color scheme. Definitely will be ordering more !
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: I had to adjust to my pair
customer_reviews.text: Update: The problems I’ve talked about in my original review no longer apply. I think my feet have gotten used to these shoes as I no longer experience pain. Original review: There is a visible defect in the pair I got. I have a normal foot (right foot) and a fallen arch foot (left) and it is squeezing my right foots "toe knuckles" causing me pain and a callus to form on the sole of my right foot. Those toes are going numb as well. Too late to return as I’ve dirtied the soles of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Phillips

customer_reviews.title: MEN'S SIZING
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised at womens shoes. When shipped they came as unisex (like, what? Never heard of Reebok unisex sizing) but they were actually a men's size. They were so cheap when I bought them, that we kept them and my husband wears them. I went to order MY size (I guess I'd order it in my MENS size?) And they were more than double the price as originally purchased. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayC.

customer_reviews.title: It goes according to men sizes
customer_reviews.text: I know it says woman but READ PEOPLE . The sizing chart is in Men’s so measure your foot and see what men size you fall into if your a woman. Other than that the sneaker is super comfy and stylish ! I’m happy with it !
customer_reviews.author: Marianita Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Everything’s off with these-color, size, fit
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, these shoes are cream, not white. That matters a lot. Second, they run large, by at least one full size. Lastly, the insole is completely flat, so while cushioned, these do not have any support at all. Total dud, returned.
customer_reviews.author: Laure

customer_reviews.title: Had to go half size down. Really like the design and hope the name brand means it’s good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Had to go half size down. Got these shoes for under $40, so couldn’t pass up that deal! I imagine they are not meant for all purposes or working out. They seem more like a special occasion shoe. I don’t plan on using them for anything but wearing out and about and special occasion. This will not be an everyday shoe. I’ll post durability update after I’ve worn them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I always have to buy and orthotic of some kind because the inserts do not give enough arch support. This seems to be the case for most sneakers. Because of this, I have been having to buy a size larger to accommodate the orthotic. They are attractive and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Roy

customer_reviews.title: Seems great but exchanging for larger size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pair and a pair of Avias to compare side by side hoping one would be good for construction work and others for every day. Unfortunately these are too small so we’ll be exchanging for a larger size. As for comparison, we found these more comfortable, more cushy and better arch support than the Avias. Wish this color was same great price in the larger size but it’s double so ordering it in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Lubbock Transplant

customer_reviews.title: Men’s sizing I’m a women’s size 10.
customer_reviews.text: They are men’s sizes. It doesn’t say this in the sizing. This is a problem with other Reebok’s also. I was looking in women’s shoes. It would be less confusing if they just used European sizing. I’m a 41 in European sizes and I got a 43. I’m a women’s size 10. I love Reebok shoes when I can get them in the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: The stock photo looks grey but the shoe is white...but still pretty dope
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes, but I did not expect them to be stark white considering they are called "Porcelain/Light Sand/Stellar Pink/Mist" ... good shoes bad description/pics
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Reeboks Are Not For Me!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 33 years old from New Jersey, these sneakers are just not it. They looked better in the picture but in person ugh. They are bulky, the tongue of the sneakers doesn't raise up really, etc. They just look like something a old man would wear, I'll pass.
customer_reviews.author: Louis J Elder

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The arch is not in the right place, and the toe box is odd and uncomfortable for me. Aesthetically they’re fine. I purchased these for the gym, but they were so uncomfortable I had to return them. I’m sure they’d be fine if just buying for the looks.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is the best, I wear braces on my legs and usually I buy shoes every mouth because of the wear and tear ,but these are going 0n 5 months and still.. I ordered another pair,, well made
customer_reviews.author: John  Burek

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy this is a hard tennis
customer_reviews.text: Very hard shoe and tight. Once you wear Brooks I think it's tough to go to any other brand. Not comfy at all..returned right away
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Ann Rasco

customer_reviews.title: New favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: I did t think much of the look but they were a great price so I tried them out. They proved to be fantastic. Such a good shoe—good grip, sturdy structure and firm sole. I am very active for work, and they have lasted longer than any other shoe I have bought for work, even other Reebok models.
customer_reviews.author: LaGina Phillips

customer_reviews.title: LOOK GREAT FEEL GREAT
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice and fit as described, super com and look great on your feet. Definitely will be buying more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Lesure

customer_reviews.title: chunky shoes, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the ~90's look, as it is easy to put together and very very comfortable. I own 3 pairs of aztrek shoes and they're even more comfortable than they look. The faux suede material gets dirty easily. I ruined a pair trying to clean it with chlorine bleach externally, so don't do what I did. Now I throw them in a washer with peroxide bleach (like Clorox 2) and they stay looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lee

customer_reviews.title: Size unexpected
customer_reviews.text: I bought size7 but it actually like size 8, compare with another Nike size 7shose. It is definitely too big in size7!
customer_reviews.author: jasonlinda1

customer_reviews.title: Casual and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. Perfect for casual wear. Treads provide good traction. Haven't tried it on trails yet but I think it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Schwantes

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well they fit and felt. This was my first pair of Reebok sneakers. I was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am very pick on shoes and am very happy to have purchased these. They are of good quality and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Claxton

customer_reviews.title: Great deal great fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. I noticed, sketchers and Reebok prices fluctuate. I got these for $22. A week later they were $56. Been getting good deals and saving lots.
customer_reviews.author: Virg

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect (mens 10.5) and are comfortable. What a bargain at $32.26
customer_reviews.author: Allen M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great and are very comfortable! Reeboks for $20, that is a no brainier! Get'em while they are "hot".
customer_reviews.author: Lanelle Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I never realized I could buy Reebok's at such a reasonable price. Plus they fit perfectly and wear comfy :-)
customer_reviews.author: StanF

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: At a quick glance they look like a decent pair of running shoes; however, after a good look it's evident I bought a pair of shoes made of 2nd rate material. Additionally, the shoes run about a half size too large; and the product does not offer much flexibility in the sole.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY FOR 20 DOLLAR$... I'M SHOCKED
customer_reviews.text: I liked these Shoes!!! They run jus a wee bit bigger than normal but not large enough to make it a problem or anything. They are pretty comfortable and I have gotten several compliments the 1st day of wearing them... Added a few pics to check em out. Sorry it was night lol
customer_reviews.author: Tyrus

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: These are extra big. I wonder if they are actually men’s sizes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoe were a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised and was a good price. I have only had a short time and they are very comfortable,
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Robb

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: great shoes better than expected..good quality comfortable durable good running shoes

customer_reviews.title: An ok shoe
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really want a white shoe but the price was right. Not great but OK for walking.

customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome. If you love shoes and want something that’s retro then this is it. Couldn’t be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WarEagleWill

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Fit just a little to big coulda got a 8 1/2 i ordered them for the gym still like them an wearable

customer_reviews.title: Different colour of sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Got my shoes but they with different colors, one without laces and not in the original box.
customer_reviews.author: Darya

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about them! Fit as expected. I ordered and 8 1/2 and they fit fine, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Not too comfy
customer_reviews.text: not to comfy in the front(toes). i should buy 4.5W.
customer_reviews.author: Edna m.Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable, fit as expected. Not sure about wear
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I used the conversion chart lower in the product description to order these in women’s size. I was apprehensive that the fit would be a problem but am very pleased with the result.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfrct
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I walk everyday fit just right
customer_reviews.author: carmen silva

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a large, wide foot and these Reebok’s have held their integrity. They look good on his feet and they don’t sag. They come m a bunch of different colors, too
customer_reviews.author: L'Erin Wynn

customer_reviews.title: gf loved it
customer_reviews.text: fit as expected. got dirty real fast so usse them in controlled enviroments
customer_reviews.author: Artie Ziff

customer_reviews.title: look better in person
customer_reviews.text: I got these Aztrek sneakers on a whim because of the great price, if you are hesitant I feel like they look way better in person than they do online. The fit good and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Might be able to go down a half-size; but great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Classic shoe, great color and nice fit. They're a little big, but not so big that they're uncomfortable. It was a good purchase. Glad I made it.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it, definitely
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but solid, comfortable and stylis, it's unisex,so sometimes it looks girlish,but it's really good quality and comfortable pair shoes
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: The size!
customer_reviews.text: I did no used the shoe. I just want to return it. It's too big. The size is no good and too bulky
customer_reviews.author: Miriam surla

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Great color. Fit right. First time I bought on line. Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard D. Gamber

customer_reviews.title: Break them in first.
customer_reviews.text: A lil smaller but just had to break them in
customer_reviews.author: Dez & Carl

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Good comfortable shoe for such a great price. These are boy sizes so ladies be careful when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are big. Feels over half size to big. I've had the same shoe size most of my life and never have a problem ordering online but now I have to go through the trouble of a return
customer_reviews.author: Conni

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: As described. Fits comfortable. Only downside is its material and not leather, so you have to keep clean. Otherwise worth the money and good looking pair of kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Unisex shoe can not fit both men and women
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this shoe can be a unisex when men sizes are different from women’s. I ordered 9 women’s but received a men’s 9 which naturally is too big
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome lol
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a retro looking sneaker and this was perfect. These are super comfy. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Quartz

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money ($25). The fit is tight but doable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Do not fit right
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit well are not like the picture ugly
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Too big but comfy as hell!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy but I ordered a 6 fit like an 8.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby GT

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are so comfortable and the colour combination is popping.
customer_reviews.author: Cameoso

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I'm an 8 in women's so I got a 6.5 since its men's sizes. Super cute in a casual dress or in workout gear. Super comfortable to workout in.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are stylish and very comfortable. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyBell

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfort, Cool Price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are just as comfortable as they look which I need when working on my feet all day. No regrets

customer_reviews.title: Two left feet?
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look good - too bad I got two left shoes instead of a pair!!!!!! Box was also pretty beat up for a brand new pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: At 23 bucks they were a steal. I went to go buy another pair and they were 91$. Someone goofed on my original purchase. They are comfy as hell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pair of Shors
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of shoes for the price. Very comfortable and fit great. Would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my sneakers my son got the same pair and I had to have them they’re very comfortable 😊

customer_reviews.title: Know what you want
customer_reviews.text: I like the service how quickly I received the product I like the fact of the private fit
customer_reviews.author: john sullivan

customer_reviews.title: pay attention to sizing
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Comfortable, stylish. Just an FYI- these are men's sizes. I wear a women's size 8 and ordered a 6.5 in these, and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To put if it a woman or man sneaker
customer_reviews.text: It was to big I neeed a woman size sneaker

customer_reviews.title: To size to big
customer_reviews.text: The sneaker looks like a size 12 but they supposed to be a 8 1/2

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Was here in less than 7 days, fits perfect as well. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ely Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Loved colors but didn’t realize was Unisex. I missed that so shoe size is more for a mans foot

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Can i exchange for a size 9
customer_reviews.text: It is to big for my feet i need a size 9 in women

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe! The color is a bit darker than photo lends....however still a nice look.
customer_reviews.author: Boulware Family 35223

product_meta.title: Reebok Unisex Adults’ Aztrek Sneaker
product_meta.description: Reebok classics: fuses the brand’s fitness heritage with the modern looks of fitness reflected in running and training to support the game changer consumer who seeks to reflect a fitness lifestyle in every aspect of life.
feature_bullets: Synthetic and textile upper for breathable support
Designed for: Casual style; launched in 1993 as all-terrain runners, The aztrek is a rugged and versatile shoe with throwback style
